variable.label: Starting Voltage
variable.tooltip: Determines the starting speed (1-75)
variable.label: Starting Voltage
Acceleration
variable.tooltip: This value multiplied by 0.869 gives the time from stop to maximum speed (0-64)
variable.label: Acceleration
Deceleration
variable.tooltip: This value multiplied by 0.869 gives the time from maximum speed to stop (0-64)
variable.label: Deceleration
Maximum Speed
variable.tooltip: Maximum speed of locomotive (0-64)
variable.label: Maximum Speed
Medium speed
variable.tooltip: Speed of locomotive at medium speed step (0-64)
variable.label: Medium speed
Software Version Number
variable.tooltip: The decoder version number (read only)
variable.label: Software Version Number
Manufacturer ID
variable.tooltip: The manufacturer's ID number (read only)
variable.label: Manufacturer ID
Consist Address Active For F9 in Forward
Consist Address Active For F9 in Forward
Consist Address Active For F10 in Forward
Consist Address Active For F10 in Forward
Consist Address Active For F9 in Reverse
Consist Address Active For F9 in Reverse
Consist Address Active For F10 in Reverse
Consist Address Active For F10 in Reverse
Direction of Travel
variable.tooltip: Sets the relative direction of the loco when told to move forward
variable.label: Direction of Travel
Speed Steps
variable.tooltip: Sets the speed step mode. 128 speed steps are recognized automatically
variable.label: Speed Steps
Analogue mode
variable.tooltip: Determines whether loco can operate on conventional DC current (enables Power Source Conversion)
variable.label: Analogue mode
Selection of speed curve
variable.tooltip: Determines whether loco will use manufacturer's internal or user-defined speed step table
variable.label: Selection of speed curve
Function key triggered at each change of function status
Function key triggered at each change of function status
Control reference
variable.tooltip: Determines the back EMF that the motorshould supply at maximum speed (0-80)
variable.label: Control reference
Load control parameter K
variable.tooltip: Determines how strongly load control effects (0-80)
variable.label: Load control parameter K
Load control parameter I
variable.tooltip: Determines the momentum of the motor (0-80)
variable.label: Load control parameter I
Load control influence
variable.tooltip: Determines up to how many % of the speed load control is active (0-64)
variable.label: Load control influence
Forward Trim
variable.tooltip: Divided by 128 results in the factor, with which the motor voltage is multiplied in forward mode (0-255)
variable.label: Forward Trim
Reverse Trim
variable.tooltip: Divided by 128 results in the factor, with which the motor voltage is multiplied in reverse mode (0-255)
variable.label: Reverse Trim
Blinking frequency
variable.tooltip: Frequency of Strobe effects. Always a multiple of 65,536 ms (4-64).
variable.label: Blinking frequency
Brightness Headlights
variable.tooltip: Range 0-15, Brightness: dark-maximum (Pulse: 0.5-8 seconds)
variable.label: Brightness Headlights
Brightness Back up lights
variable.tooltip: Range 0-15, Brightness: dark-maximum (Pulse: 0.5-8 seconds)
variable.label: Brightness Back up lights
Brightness AUX1
variable.tooltip: Range 0-15, Brightness: dark-maximum (Pulse: 0.5-8 seconds)(Coupler hold power:none-full track power)
variable.label: Brightness AUX1
Brightness AUX2
variable.tooltip: Range 0-15, Brightness: dark-maximum (Pulse: 0.5-8 seconds)(Coupler hold power:none-full track power)
variable.label: Brightness AUX2
Brightness AUX3
variable.tooltip: Range 0-15, Brightness: dark-maximum (Pulse: 0.5-8 seconds)
variable.label: Brightness AUX3
Brightness AUX4
variable.tooltip: Range 0-15, Brightness: dark-maximum (Pulse: 0.5-8 seconds)
variable.label: Brightness AUX4
Brightness AUX5
variable.tooltip: Range 0-15, Brightness: dark-maximum (Pulse: 0.5-8 seconds)
variable.label: Brightness AUX5
Brightness AUX6
variable.tooltip: Range 0-15, Brightness: dark-maximum (Pulse: 0.5-8 seconds)
variable.label: Brightness AUX6
Bit for incorrect travel (Motorola)
variable.tooltip: Applies to Motorola only
variable.label: Bit for incorrect travel (Motorola)
Saves the status of function buttons
variable.tooltip: Determines, which data are to be saved and used after an interruption of the power supply
variable.label: Saves the status of function buttons
Saves the current speed setting
variable.tooltip: Determines, which data are to be saved and used after an interruption of the power supply
variable.label: Saves the current speed setting

Start delay
variable.tooltip: Delays the start (range 0-255). Allows synchronized starting of locos with LokSound decoders (for consist operation).
variable.label: Start delay
Constant brake distance
variable.tooltip: Determines the brake distance which will be maintained regardless of the speed of the train. Range 0-64.
variable.label: Constant brake distance

factReset.label: HARD RESET all CVs reset to default values
